ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from editing the CPI field used for renewal Opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Id != "00550000001QEeI", /* Diane Lawyer */ $User.Id != "00550000002q64G", /* Jennifer Richard */ $User.Id != "00550000000sNmf", /* Eldean Ward */ $User.Id != "00550000001QCqH", /* Jason Wood */ $User.Id != "00550000005FVBK", /* Maya Peterson */ $User.ProfileId != "00e30000000bvR3", /* System Administrator */ OR( AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK(CPI__c)) ), ISCHANGED(CPI__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The CPI field may only be edited by CSM Operations. Please contact CSM Ops if these fields need to be updated.
